replies.body:
Why shouldn't you know why comments get archived?
We archive spam and off topic comments.

Also, if a current situation doesn't directly involve you, then you don't need to know about the situation. Only the person involved and the staff member should know about the situation, generally.
replies.body_tagged:
Why shouldn't you know why comments get archived?
We archive spam and off topic comments.

Also, if a current situation doesn't directly involve you, then you don't need to know about the situation. Only the person involved and the staff member should know about the situation, generally.
